name: Dill and Black Pepper Fish
author: Sheila Jenkinson
summary: My father is a fantastic fisherman, so I always have a deep freezer full of fish. We prepare it many different ways, but this is by far the kids' favorite at our house. An easy way to prepare fish for the whole family to enjoy!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
¾ cup crushed dill-pickle-flavored potato chips
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease a rimmed baking sheet with oil
Combine crushed chips, pepper, and onion powder in a medium bowl
Dip cod in buttermilk; drain off excess
Place cod on the prepared baking dish and press chip mixture evenly on top of the fillets
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes
